channel.title: Help in making a 508 or 525 client
channel.description: Ok so to start off i need help in making a 508 or 525 client. I need one of you goood guys to message me not reply please step by step or just help me in the no-ip part i cant get it i dont need to portfoward i got verizon wireless. if you help ill rep you

item.title: Help in making a 508 or 525 client
item.dc:creator: @ShadowDD ShadowDD
item.description:
@ShadowDD wrote:

Im not pming you for this it’s not like its secret… And second you can’t rep. And you can go to http://www.no-ip.com I think is link if that don’t work just look up no-ip on google http://www.google.com and then yea make an account add a host then go back to google and lookup no-ip again then go to download and download the no-ip thing open it login then you check the box and then if you know how to portfword or what ever…

Read full topic
item.source: Help in making a 508 or 525 client
